title: SPAMMER: “alanvoyage”
content: … to be kicked off immediately, please.
author: Andreas Stötzner

comments.content:
<cite>Well, y'all let me know his address, an if he lives anywheres nearby, I'll mosey over an whump 'um up 'longside the head.</cite>

<cite>Otherwise, best to follow Typophile's spam reporting guideline:</cite>

when you find something like this, please email me directly at [typographer@gmail.com](mailto:typographer@gmail.com) and with a subject line — Typophile spam.

I think I got it all ...but I'm only a lowly spam slayer clearing out spam post-by-post I don't have the authority to nuke a whole account ...sigh.

I sent Chris Dean a email notifying him the users account.

n.
